name: Robot Drone
movement: slow on ground but fast flying at 40 feet
description: A small, flying construct with a sleek design and a metallic surface, capable of agile aerial maneuvers.
memorable: Its immunity to many debilitating conditions and ability to explode in a cloud of poisonous fumes make it a unique opponent.
goals: Act as a scout and automatic combatant in various scenarios.
relations: Often has a creator who understands its language but cannot communicate verbally.
environment: Typically found in settings associated with technology or robotics.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, and various conditions like paralysis.
weaknesses: Low physical capabilities with negative scores in Strength and Intelligence.
attacks: Uses a Slam attack for close combat and a Flame Jet for ranged fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Electrical Malfunction; incapacitated if it fails a saving throw after taking lightning damage.
senses: Has a good perception score of 15, allowing it to notice details effectively.
skills: Good at stealth with a score of 13, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to Construct Nature.
Can safely attack nearby enemies thanks to Point-Blank Shots ability.
Leaves a cloud of poison when using its Fueled Escape ability.
Relies on ranged attacks more than physical strength.
Effective as a scout due to its flight and stealth.

construct that explodes in fuel fumes
